newsitem.title: UK: HORSE RACING-OAKS WINNER LADY CARLA TO MISS ST LEGER.
newsitem.headline: HORSE RACING-OAKS WINNER LADY CARLA TO MISS ST LEGER.

text.p: Epsom Oaks winner Lady Carla has been ruled out of Saturday's St Leger at Doncaster, the final classic of the English season.
Lady Carla, a nine-length winner at Epsom, has not run since her shock odds-on defeat in the Irish Oaks in July.
She was forced out of last month's Yorkshire Oaks by a slight setback and has not recovered in time to run in Saturday's contest, for which she had been quoted at 5-1.
Trainer Henry Cecil still runs 7-2 joint favourite Dushyantor, the mount of Pat Eddery, and outsider Flying Legend.
Latest betting: 7-2 Dushyantor and Mons, 11-2 Sharaf Kabeer, 7-1 Gordi, 8-1 Heron Island, Shantou, 10-1 St Mawes, 14-1 and upwards others.
